verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Sun of my soul, Thou Savior dear, it is not night if Thou be near; O, may no earth-born cloud arise, to hide Thee from Thy servant's eyes.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: When the soft dews of kindly sleep my weary eyelids gently steep, be my last thought-- how sweet to rest forever on my Savior's breast!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Abide with me from morn till eve, for without Thee I cannot live; abide with me when night is nigh, for without Thee I dare not die.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Be near to bless me when I wake ere through the world our way I take; abide with me till in Thy love I lose myself in heav'n above.
